#summary &otilde character entity
#labels about-html,from-w3c
#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesO

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesO O] > &otilde

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Otilde;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00d5/index.htm U+000D5].
  * `&Otilde` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00d5/index.htm U+000D5].
  * `&otilde;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00f5/index.htm U+000F5].
  * `&otilde` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00f5/index.htm U+000F5].
